comments.author: Arnold Schilham, UMCU
comments.creator: generate_config_json.py version 20180912
usage: "OCR_xxx:prefix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx starts with this and this should be stripped
"OCR_xxx:suffix": "mm" # text in bounding box of OCR_xxx ends with this and this should be stripped

params.channel: convert to RGB by using channel number 0,1,2 or "avg", or "rgb" (2)

probeID.type: contents of bounding box of OCR_probeID should be of this type
probeID.xywh: bounding box of probeID if specified, this will be used as identifier for values, else from dicom headers

params.ocr_threshold: threshold on pixel values to remove background gradient (0)
